Get team records by year

cfl_game_records.Rd

Get team records by year

cfl_game_records(season = NA, team = NA)

Arguments

team

(String optional): Team - Select a valid team, D1 football
year

(Integer optional): Year, 4 digit format (YYYY)
conference

(String optional): DI Conference abbreviation - Select a valid FBS conference
Conference abbreviations P5: ACC, B12, B1G, SEC, PAC
Conference abbreviations G5 and FBS Independents: CUSA, MAC, MWC, Ind, SBC, AAC
verbose

Logical parameter (TRUE/FALSE, default: FALSE) to return warnings and messages from function

Source

https://api.cfl.ca/v1/standings/

Value

cfl_game_records() - A data frame with 20 variables:

division_id : integer.

Division ID

division_name : character.

Division Name

place : integer.

Place in Division

flags : character.

Flags

team_id : integer.

Team Id

letter : character.

First letter of team abbreviation

abbreviation : character.

Team abbreviation

location : character.

Team location

nickname : character.

Team Mascot

full_name : character.

Full name (eg: BC Lions)

games_played : integer.

Games Played

wins : integer.

Wins

losses : integer.

Losses

ties : integer.

Ties

points : integer.

Points in Standings (2pts for W, 1pt for T)

winning_percentage : integer.

Win %: Pts / (Games Played * 2)

points_for : integer.

Points Scored

points_against : integer.

Points Scored Against

home_wins : integer.

Home Wins

home_losses : integer.

Home Losses

home_ties : integer.

Home Ties

away_wins : integer.

Road wins

away_losses : integer.

Road losses

away_ties : integer.

Road ties

division_wins : integer.

Division Wins

division_losses : integer.

Division Losses

division_ties : integer.

Division Ties

season : integer.

Season

Examples

# \donttest{
  cfl_game_records(2018, team = "WPG")

#> Error in cfl_game_records(2018, team = "WPG"): could not find function "cfl_game_records"

# }
